name: Search Movie Name Puzzles - Mega Word Search
name_original: Search Movie Name Puzzles - Mega Word Search
description:
Search Movie Name Puzzles is a treat for all Crossword and Word Search Games lovers!!

Your goal is to find all the hidden words inside the grid. Hidden words can be in any orientation- up, down, left, right, or diagonally. You can also get word puzzles in either direction, forward or backward, much to spin your head.

How to Play?
- Swipe over the letters in the board to form the words shown below it.
- Find all the words in the list to complete the level.
- Find the words faster and share your best time on your social network & earn 100 game coins each time you share.
- Stuck somewhere – use hint or remove extra character feature to solve the puzzle.

More than 15 categories to play:
- Musical Movies
- Historic Movies
- Horror Movies
- Mystery Movies
- Documentary Movies
- Fantasy Movies
- Thriller Movies
- Adventure Movies
- Biopics Movies
- Crime Movies
- Sports Movies
- Action Movies
- Comedy Movies
- Sci-Fi Movies
- Animation Movies
- Romance Movies

Playing this game may challenge your brain and improve your word power.

Install the app now to start the game.
